properties.body:
EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
LIBYA.
DNC 08, DNC 09.
VESSEL, 80 PERSONS ON BOARD, DISABLED AND ADRIFT,
IN VICINITY 33-46.8N 012-16.5E AT 061905Z MAR 19.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO
RCC LIBYA PHONE: 2182 1444 6799, 2182 1563 1578,
FAX: 2182 1360 6868, E-MAIL: SAR@ANS.CAA.GOV.LY
OR LIBYAN NAVY COAST GUARD, PHONE: 2182 1444 9149,
FAX: 2182 1360 9274,
E-MAIL: LCG.NAV.ROOM@GMAIL.COM, NHA@LTTNET.NET OR
RCC MALTA, PHONE: 356 2124 9784, FAX: 356 2180 9860,
E-MAIL: RCCMALTA@GOV.MT,
PHONE: 216 7156 0244, FAX: 216 7156 1804,
E-MAIL: TUNISIANNAVY@DEFENCE.TN OR MRCC ROME,
PHONE: 3906 5908 4527, 3906 5908 4409,
FAX: 390 6592 2737, 3906 5908 4793,
E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
